name: MastermindforNonprofits
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Blossom e-learning delivers capacity-building information and applicable tools for serious do-gooders. Our briefs bring you news you can use, innovative ideas, and techniques that will elevate your performance as a nonprofit leader about to change the world!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
